```{r Libraries, include=FALSE}
library(vegan)
library(mvabund)
```

```{r data, include=FALSE}
data("iris")
```



CORRELATION BETWEEN FLOWER METRICS
```{r plotting, echo=FALSE}
#to plot all variables by pairs: we plot only numeric variables
pairs(iris[,1:4])
cor(iris[,1:4])
```


#PCA analysis
```{r PCA, echo=FALSE}
iris.pca <- prcomp(iris[,1:4])

iris.pca
#no me ha quedado claro como lo ha interpretado

summary(iris.pca)
#we can see component 1 is really good because it explains 92% of the variance
```
